SELECT D.DEPT_ID, D.DEPT_NAME, HP.DR_POSITION, HP.DR_NAME, HP.DR_FIELD, HP.DR_EDUCATION, HP.DR_CAREER, HP.FILEONE, F.FILE_PATH FROM DEPT D JOIN HP_MEMBER HP ON D.DEPT_ID = HP.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FILESTORE F ON HP.FILEONE = F.FILESTORE_ID
AND HP.QUIT = 0
AND HP.DR_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{drName} || '%'
AND D.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{deptName} || '%'
AND (HP.DR_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchQuery} || '%' OR D.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchQuery} || '%')
ORDER BY HP.DR_NAME
ORDER BY D.DEPT_NAME
ORDER BY (HP.DR_NAME || D.DEPT_NAME)

SELECT A.COUNT, B.DR_NAME, B.DR_POSITION, B.DR_FIELD, B.DR_EDUCATION, B.DR_CAREER, B.FILEONE, C.DEPT_NAME, F.FILE_PATH FROM ( SELECT DR_ID, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM RECORD GROUP BY DR_ID ) A JOIN HP_MEMBER B ON A.DR_ID = B.DR_ID JOIN DEPT C ON B.DEPT_ID = C.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FILESTORE F ON B.FILEONE = F.FILESTORE_ID
WHERE B.QUIT = 0 AND ROWNUM <= 2
SELECT * FROM DEPT WHERE HP_ID = 'SSW' AND QUIT = 0
